thread.title: Chris Brown cuddles daughter on new album cover
thread.title_full: Chris Brown cuddles daughter on new album cover

title: Chris Brown cuddles daughter on new album cover
text:
Chris Brown cuddles daughter on new album cover 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Saturday 17th October, 2015 
Proud father Chris Brown is paying tribute to his daughter on his latest album cover. 
The 26-year-old rapper took to Instagram to share the cover art for his upcoming album, 'Royalty,' which he named in honor of his 17-month-old daughter, reports E! Online. 
The 'Loyal' hit-maker captioned the picture, "ROYALTY ALBUM COVER," in which he is seen shirtless, cradling his daughter as her head rests peacefully on his shoulder. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News
